title: RA eSports A new Org. Come check us out.
body:
We recently had our official Launch and there are a bunch of open positions if you are interested.
**Check out our recruitment Section**
http://raesports.webs.com/recruitment

Also feel free to give us a like or follow if you believe in our ideals to make this region better.

**Facebook**
https://www.facebook.com/

**Twitter**
https://twitter.com/RA_eSports?lang=en

**Website**
http://raesports.webs.com/
